description:
After absorbing Hiyori, who fused with Princess Ichikishima, Princess Tagitsu has finally obtained the complete power of the three goddesses. Upon returning to the city, Princess Tagitsu begins to open the door between this world and the netherworld. Meanwhile, Kanami and the others have been dispatched to deal with the more frequent aradama appearances. Mai and the rest of the team can tell that Kanami is pushing herself too hard.
Source: crunchyroll
